mean_cn: n. 赋与肉体，具人形，化身
mean_en: one of a series of lives that a person is believed to have had in the past in some religions
sentence: Some people believe that black cats are the incarnation of the god of death.
sentence_trans: 一些人认为黑猫是死神的化身。
word_etyma: in 使…”、“作…” + carn 肉 + ation 表示行为、情况、状态、过程、结果 → n. 赋与肉体, 具人形, 化身
